Examples
========

.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   ./demos
   ./codegen

*"A demonstrations is worth a thousand words."*

There are examples of developments based on `Telegram-Bot-Discussion`:

* special repository of `demos code <https://gitverse.ru/BorisPlus/Telegram-Bot-Discussion-Examples>`_ (also see :doc:`page <./demos>`);
* runned these demos in `Telegram` infrastructure (slightly modified, see `@tg_bot_discussion <https://t.me/tg_bot_discussion>`_);
* code generated template example integrated inside package `Telegram-Bot-Discussion` (see :doc:`page <./codegen>`).
